release_note: In Pro Version TranscribeTask is recommended for transcribing audio files with an estimated working time of 3 minutes. The necessary update has been made for this approach.
Upload limit increased to 200 MB. Compress function added for Pro version. Help section has been added for informational purposes when processing long audio files

TranscribeTask method added for Long Audio files. There is no need to wait for the results for a long time. Just uploading the file is enough. After the file is uploaded the result can be obtained by opening the application again after a certain period of time typically 10 30 minutes and checking the TaskResult. Save method has also been added. Also Small Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed. Split Transcribe method has also been added for audio files longer than 30 minutes.
Bugs fixed and analytic events are added.
